channel.title: Kw’s Blog (wordpress)
channel.description: A blog about everything and nothing.

item.title: bit.ly Pro - New Features for Website Owners
item.description: I just became a bit.ly Pro user - here's some information about it.

item.title: Language change + Kw's Devel Site
item.description:
A giant update: The Kw’s Devel Site is now dead.

Well, the blog is gonna end with Polish articles. It will be in English. The next thing is the Kw’s Devel Site, a place for all my development stuff. You cannot visit it anymore.

item.title: Some of The Year 2010 Is Archived.
item.description: Are you looking for posts from 2010? Sorry, but some of them (specifically, the ones in Polish) are removed. You can find them here: 2010 Polish Archives. Unless I removed some of them, which I did.

item.title: The Year 2009 Is Archived.
item.description: Are you looking for posts from 2009? Sorry, but they are removed. You can find them here: 2009 Archives.
